title: The Automorphism groups of zero-dimensional monomial algebras
authors:
Roberto D\'iaz and Alvaro Liendo and Gonzalo Manzano-Flores and Andriy
  Regeta
abstract:
A monomial algebra B is defined as a quotient of a polynomial ring by a
monomial ideal, which is an ideal generated by a finite set of monomials. In
this paper, we determine the automorphism group of a monomial algebra B, under
the assumption that B is a finite-dimensional vector space over a field of
characteristic zero. We achieve this by providing an explicit classification of
the homogeneous locally nilpotent derivations of B. The main body of the paper
addresses the more general case of semigroup algebras, with the polynomial ring
being a particular case.
